QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_ui_home_pages.id odf_pk, cmn_ui_home_pages.code as code, cmn_ui_home_pages.NAV_LINK_ID as nav_link_id, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, cmn_ui_home_pages.position as position, CMN_UI_HOME_PAGES.CREATED_DATE as created_date, cmn_ui_home_pages.TYPE as type, CMN_UI_HOME_PAGES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by from cmn_ui_home_pages cmn_ui_home_pages JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=cmn_ui_home_pages.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=cmn_ui_home_pages.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
